entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
